changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "tb_asset" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "updated_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "name" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "symbol" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "slug" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "logo_url" VARCHAR(255) NULL, "network" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "contract" CHAR(42) NULL, "decimals" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 18, "is_active" BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE, --- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), UNIQUE ("symbol"), UNIQUE ("slug") );
